ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Component_non_planar_location is the translation and orientation in three dimensions for the positioning of the . This Application Object requires for completeness.
the component specifies the for the Component_non_planar_location. The Next_higher_assembly_relationship specifies the actual component being placed.
the assembly_model specifies the for the Component_non_planar_location.
the component_model specifies the for the Component_non_planar_location.

the placement_fixed specifies whether or not the Component_non_planar_location is fixed. A value of TRUE indicates that the Component_non_planar_location is fixed. A value of FALSE indicates that the Component_non_planar_location is not fixed.
the transformation specifies the for the Component_non_planar_location.

A Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship is a type of . A Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship is the association between a or a and the that is the occurrence of that planar shape. If the type of the shape representation of the assembly is different from the type of the shape representation of the part, the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship allows a processor to create a shape rep of the assembly type and establish an equivalency relationship between that shape representation and the part shape representation. If the shape representation of the assembly is of the same type as the part shape representation, the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship shall reference the same shape representation as both the part_shape and the component_shape. That instance shall be a complex instance of the part shape and of the component shape.
the component_shape specifies the role of the for the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship.
the part_shape specifies the for the Component_part_2d_non_planar_geometric_representation_relationship.
A Design_intent_modification_non_planar_2d_shape is the representation of a by a .
the represented_design_intent_modification specifies the that is to be characterized by the Design_intent_modification_non_planar_2d_shape.
